name: Saratoga Historical Museum
description: Explore the rich history of Saratoga and its surrounding communities.

name: Hakone Gardens
description: A beautiful and peaceful Japanese garden in the heart of the city.

name: Heritage Orchard Park
description: The Heritage Orchard was designated as a City park in 1984 in recognition of the City's agricultural heritage.

description: The Saratoga Certified Farmers Market offers seasonal fruits and vegetables from Santa Clara County year-round in the parking lot.

name: Wildwood Park
description: Mature trees fill this public park also offering picnic tables & a children's playground

name: Montalvo Arts Center
description: Performing arts complex with indoor & outdoor stages, plus landscaped gardens & walking trails.
